description.schinese: 击败过去的贝灵顿男爵

description.english: Reach a score of 2,500 or more!
Reach a score of 5,000 or more!
Reach a score of 10,000 or more!
Reach a score of 15,000 or more!
Reach a score of 20,000 or more!
Reach a score of 25,000 or more!
Reach a score of 30,000 or more!
Reach a score of 40,000 or more!
Reach a score of 50,000 or more!
Reach a score of 75,000 or more!

displayName.schinese: 马卡拉克的马卡龙狂热

description.english: Guide the lost baby dino back to its parents!
description.schinese: 带小恐龙迪诺找到它的父母

description.english: Find some beans with the BeanBot!
description.schinese: 跟着豆豆机器人找到豆子

description.english: Buy a VIP Card from Rabboon!
Pick up the Cherrock from the Cherrock Plant!
description.schinese: 从樱岩植物上采集樱岩！

description.english: Drive over an enemy with the lore!
Steal the Key Bubble from the Key Guardians!
description.schinese: 从守卫处偷走钥匙泡泡
获得那个疼疼的小鼓包啦！

description.english: Answer all three of Quizfish's questions correctly!
description.schinese: 连续答对3次问答鱼的问题

description.english: Play a cool melody on Jam Island!
description.schinese: 在果酱岛上演奏出一些美妙的音乐。
成功完成记忆鼯鼠的游戏

description.english: Hatch your own bronze, silver or golden Pig!
Find some Beans with the BrokenBot!
description.schinese: 和故障机器人一起找到豆子

description.english: Make it through a Vector Space Dungeon floor without getting hit by meteors!
description.schinese: 在不被陨石击中的情况下通关向量空间

description.english: Free Laike from her broken spaceship!
description.schinese: 从故障的飞船中救出莱卡

description.english: Enter the Gear Shrine Depths from the Flat Flat Plains!
description.schinese: 从平平原野进入齿轮神殿

description.english: Enter the Gear Shrine Depths from the Shiny Caves or Kaboom Dunes!
description.schinese: 从闪耀洞窟或爆裂沙丘进入齿轮神殿

description.english: Enter the Gear Shrine Depths from the Odd Ocean or the Thunder Peaks!
description.schinese: 从奇异海洋或雷霆峰进入齿轮神殿

description.english: Enter the Gear Shrine Depths from the Toy Box Tangle or the Vector Space!
description.schinese: 从玩具箱迷境或向量空间进入齿轮神殿

description.english: Complete a run with 2 or more team members!
description.schinese: 以2名或以上队员完成一局游戏

description.english: Complete a run with 4 team members!
description.schinese: 以4名成员完成一局游戏

description.english: Use an Item at the Camp!
Change your Skill at the Camp!
Equip a Sticker at the Camp!
Equip a Holo Sticker at the Camp!
description.schinese: 在营地装备一次全息贴纸

description.english: Equip a Cursed Sticker at the Camp!
description.schinese: 在营地装备一次诅咒贴纸

description.english: Spend Experience Points to grow a character!
description.schinese: 使用经验值提升角色属性

description.english: Collect over 10 Buttons in one run!
description.schinese: 在一次游戏中获取纽币10个以上

description.english: Buy something from the Squawk Store!
description.schinese: 在斯夸克的商店购买商品

description.english: Buy a Skill with two Attributes!
description.schinese: 购买一个具有2重属性的技能

description.english: Let Rabboon reroll your Skill Attributes three times!
description.schinese: 在拉贝恩处重置技能3次

description.english: Buy so much from a Trader, that they are out of stock!
description.schinese: 将一个商人的所有货物全部买空

description.english: Steal a Cookpot from an Enemy Camp!
description.schinese: 从敌人的营地“借”走烹饪锅
在一局游戏中烹饪出5个“马卡龙”

description.english: Reach the Gear Shrine in less than 12 minutes!
Reach the Gear Shrine in less than 10 minutes!
Reach the Gear Shrine in less than 8 minutes!
Reach the Gear Shrine in less than 6 minutes!
Reach the Gear Shrine in less than 4 minutes!
Reach the Gear Shrine in less than 2 minutes!
Collect all 3 rewards in the pink Mystery House!
description.schinese: 在粉色秘境小屋中收集全部3个奖励

description.english: Collect all 3 rewards in the blue Mystery House!
description.schinese: 在蓝色秘境小屋中收集全部3个奖励

description.english: Collect all 3 rewards in the yellow Mystery House!
description.schinese: 在黄色秘境小屋中收集全部3个奖励

description.english: Collect all 3 rewards in the green Mystery House!
description.schinese: 在绿色秘境小屋中收集全部3个奖励

description.english: Reach a Critical Hit Chance of 100%!
Upgrade the Vigilance stat of any character 3 times!
description.schinese: 升级任意角色的“警觉”属性3次

description.english: Reach a maximum Stomach Size of 3!
Use an entrance to another area!
description.schinese: 从任意地图中找到去往另一区域的入口

description.english: Leave a Dungeon Floor with only 1 HP left!
Defeat an Enemy with a Pyroblast Trap!
description.schinese: 利用炎爆陷阱击杀敌人

description.english: Let Peep be defeated by fire damage while having at least 2 team members!
description.schinese: 让小噼在拥有至少2名队友的情况下被火焰伤害击败

description.english: Regenerate 12 Health Points or more with Lifesteal in one run!
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中通过吸血回复12点生命值或以上

description.english: Spend less than 10 seconds on a Dungeon Floor!
Deal over 20 damage with one Pyroblast!
description.schinese: 任意一次“炎爆”造成的伤害超过20点

description.english: Hit two Enemies at once with one Lightningstep!
description.schinese: 用一次闪电步同时击中2个敌人！

description.english: Hit one Enemy that is weak to the Plant-element with the Thorntendril Skill!
description.schinese: 使用荆棘卷须技能攻击一个具有植物元素弱点的敌人！

description.english: Be surrounded by a minimum of 6 Iceblades at once!
description.schinese: 同时被至少 6 把冰刃包围！
在水下使用水之爪技能

description.english: Hit an Enemy at the maximum distance with the Windblade!
description.schinese: 使用技能风刃在极限距离击中敌人

description.english: Have at least 3 Bubbleguns active at the same time!
description.schinese: 同时激活至少3把泡泡枪

description.english: Cause a John Bomb chain reaction!
Use the Thunderbolt Skill on an enemy that is weak to the Electro-element!
description.schinese: 使用雷电球击中一个弱点为点元素的敌人

description.english: Hit an Enemy with the Bojo Boom at the last bounce!
description.schinese: 利用技能蹦蹦苏打在最后一次弹跳是击中敌人。

description.english: Make a huge donation at the Elder Altar!
description.schinese: 在长老祭坛做出最高档的捐献

description.english: Reach the highest possible Karma value at the Elder Altar!
description.schinese: 在长老祭坛中天命值达到最高

description.english: Hit four Enemies at once with one ZzZFuel!
description.schinese: 使用一次嗜睡之壶击中4个敌人

description.english: Be surrounded by 8 BuddyBots at once!
description.schinese: 同时被8个伙伴机器人包围

description.english: Use the Bag Attack Skill 5 times on a Dungeon Floor!
description.schinese: 在同一地牢层中使用5次“百宝袋”技能

description.english: Equip two or more Tackle Stickers!
description.schinese: 装备2个以上的“撞击”贴纸

description.english: Find a Holo Sticker with the Sparkophile Sticker equipped!
description.schinese: 在装备“电光狂热者”贴纸的情况下找到全息贴纸

description.english: Get the Haste Status Effect with the SPEEDCAT Sticker equipped!
description.schinese: 装备极速猫贴纸时获得急速状态！

description.english: Have only 1 HP with the Mega Rush Sticker equipped!
description.schinese: 装备“极速冲刺”贴纸时仅剩1HP

description.english: Step on a Sleep Trap with the Inner Peace Sticker equipped!
description.schinese: 装备内心平静贴纸去踩睡眠陷阱！

description.english: Hit four Enemies at once with one Aerial Impulse!
description.schinese: 利用1次“空中冲击”同时击中4名敌人

description.english: Hit three Enemies at once with one Nutbomb!
description.schinese: 使用1次坚果炸弹击中3名敌人

description.english: Summon a Guardian Sphere and use it with your partner!
description.schinese: 召唤守护之球并将其用在你的队友身上！

description.english: Increase your maximum HP with the Regenerating Core Sticker!
description.schinese: 利用“再生核心”贴纸获得最大生命值加成

description.english: Have 3 or more positive Status Effects with the Boon Sticker equipped!
description.schinese: 装备“恩赐”贴纸时同时获得3种或以上被动加成

description.english: Change the ground style, water style and music of your camp!
description.schinese: 改变营地中的地板、水面与音乐
完成粉丝来信中的要求

description.english: Steal a Crystal Forge from an Enemy Camp!
description.schinese: 从敌人的营地中“借”走水晶熔炉

description.english: Modify a skill and add the Brawler, Caster or Utility attribute!
description.schinese: 修改一项技能，赋予其斗士、法师或辅助属性！

description.english: Modifiy a skill to level up one attribute to the maximum!
description.schinese: 修改技能，将一项属性提升至最高等级！

description.english: Modify a skill to remove  attribute!
description.schinese: 修改技能以移除一个负面属性！

description.english: Modify a skill and add a new attribute!
description.schinese: 修改技能并添加一个新属性！

description.english: Modify a skill and change it into a new one alltogether!
description.schinese: 修改技能并将其完全变为一个新技能！

description.english: Collect all 3 rewards from every Mystery House!
description.schinese: 从每个神秘屋收集全部 3 个奖励！

description.english: Relocate the fireplace in your own camp!
description.schinese: 将壁炉重新安置在您自己的营地中！

description.english: Collect all 3 rewards in the pink Rewind Mystery House!
description.schinese: 在粉色秘境小屋中收集全部3个奖励

description.english: Collect all 3 rewards in the blue Rewind Mystery House!
description.schinese: 在蓝色秘境小屋中收集全部3个奖励

description.english: Collect all 3 rewards in the yellow Rewind Mystery House!
description.schinese: 在黄色秘境小屋中收集全部3个奖励

description.english: Collect all 3 rewards in the green Rewind Mystery House!
description.schinese: 在绿色秘境小屋中收集全部3个奖励

description.english: Have at least 5 Buffs with the Buff Tackle Sticker equipped!
description.schinese: 装备5个及以上强化撞击技能的贴纸

description.english: Use at least 3 different "Everyone is" Stickers!
description.schinese: 至少装备3种不同的“人人都是”贴纸

description.english: Defeat a boss with the Grace Sticker equipped!
description.schinese: 装备优雅贴纸击败一个BOSS

description.english: Hit enemies 8 times with a single use of Nono!
description.schinese: 骑乘诺诺时，击中敌人8次

description.english: Reach a Speed of 100 Km/h with Nono!
Defeat the Gazing Gem during Eclipsed weather!
description.schinese: 在月蚀天气时击败凝视宝石
